AboutUs.Title: Expert Painting & Decorating for Over 20 Years
AboutUs.P1: With over 20 years of experience, I’ve built MD Wigmore to provide top-quality painting and decorating services that make a real difference. From homes to commercial spaces, my goal has always been the same—delivering work that speaks for itself, with a finish you can be proud of.
AboutUs.P2: Whether you’re refreshing a room or giving an entire property a new look, you’ll get professional, reliable service every step of the way. If you’re looking for painting that’s done right, I’m here to make sure your space looks its best.

MapMarker.Title: Welcome to MD Wigmore!
MapMarker.Subtitle: MD Wigmore is a premier painting and decorating contractor serving South West London. We specialize in high-quality interior and exterior finishes, ensuring exceptional craftsmanship on every project.
MapMarker.Action: Contact us at +44 1234 567890 or info@mdwigmore.com for more information!
